TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyWebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 为开发人员提供一种当内容页的关联母版页中已经声明了 控件的情况下声明内容页中的静态连接的方法。

span.span: Provides a way for developers to declare static connections in a content page when a control has been declared in the content page's associated master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存在的特定控件的内容中声明静态连接的方案页时控制已声明在母版页中。The control exists for the particular scenario of declaring static connections in content pages when a control has already been declared in a master page. 根据设计，使用 Web 部件控件的网页必须包含一个 （且只有一个）管理页上的所有 Web 部件控件的控件。By design, a Web page that uses Web Parts controls must contain one (and only one) control that manages all Web Parts controls on the page. 当 Web 部件应用程序使用主页面时，是常见放置控制在主页上，因为所有内容页与母版页合并在运行的时和单个控件将管理所有 Web 部件控件从所有内容页面。When a Web Parts application uses master pages, it is common to place the control in the master page, because all the content pages are merged with the master page at run time and the single control will manage all the Web Parts controls from all content pages. 但是，当开发人员想要声明静态连接此类应用程序的内容页中，它们可能会受到限制。However, when developers want to declare static connections in the content pages of such an application, they might seem to face a limitation. 静态 Web 部件连接中可以声明仅通过添加 <`asp:webpartconnection>`的子元素``元素，其本身必须是子元素的``元素。A static Web Parts connection can be declared only by adding an <`asp:webpartconnection>` element as a child of a `` element, which itself must be a child of a `` element. 但是，由于控件已在母版页中声明，但其中一个允许控件，开发人员不能声明其他中要添加静态连接的内容页的控件。But because the control was already declared in the master page, and is the one permitted control, developers cannot declare additional controls in the content pages to add static connections. 控制取代了在此方案中的控件。The control takes the place of the control in this scenario. 开发人员声明``元素而不是``中其内容页面，并且可以元素然后声明静态连接作为子元素。Developers declare an `` element instead of an `` element in their content pages, and can then declare static connections as child elements. 在运行时中的连接只需将控件添加到的集合控件并处理任何其他连接。At run time, the connections in the control are simply added to the collection of the control and treated like any other connection. 因为仅在此特定开发方案中使用控件时，它具有更多受限功能比类。Because the control is used only in this particular development scenario, it has more limited functionality than the class. 事实上，尽管控件充当代理以包含静态连接控件中内容的页面，它不会继承从控件。In fact, although the control acts as a proxy to contain static connections for the control in content pages, it does not inherit from the control. 它直接继承自，并重写只有几个基成员。It inherits directly from the class, and overrides only a few of the base members. ， ，和属性已重写并分配值，使其无法使用。The , , and properties are overridden and assigned values that prevent them from being used. 其他继承的属性会被覆盖，以调整它们的设计时行为，但它们否则具有相同的行为的基本属性。Other inherited properties are overridden to adjust their design-time behavior, but otherwise they have the same behavior as the base properties. 其中包括和属性。These include the and properties. 最后，类具有一个非继承属性。Finally, the class has one non-inherited property. 属性返回其自己的静态连接的集合 (对象)。The property returns its own collection of static connections (a object). 至于方法，类同样会重写仅几个方法，主要是将其使用限制。As for methods, the class similarly overrides only a few methods, mostly to restrict their use. 继承方法由通过引发异常，如果调用不可用。The inherited method is made unusable by throwing an exception if called. 方法始终返回空控件的集合，它会阻止从能够包含控件的集合。The method always returns an empty control collection, which has the effect of preventing it from being able to contain a collection of controls. 最后，方法调用基方法，然后将分配的所引用的连接集合属性设置为属性的控件。Finally, the method calls the base method, and then assigns the collection of connections referenced by the property to the property of the control. 此操作将汇总所有内容页面中声明的所有静态连接使它们的连接集合的一部分由和维护母版页中的控件。This has the effect of rolling up all the static connections declared in all content pages and making them part of the connections collection maintained by the control in the master page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类上的应用程序使用主页面中的内容页面中声明静态连接。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to declare static connections on content pages in an application that uses master pages. 该示例包含五个部分：The example has five parts: - 使你能够更改 Web 部件的用户控件在页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控件作为提供程序和使用者的连接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载用户控件，内容页面中，主网页和控制应用程序。A master Web page that hosts the user control, the content pages, and the control for the application. - 内容的网页所在控件、 两个自定义控件和静态连接来连接两个控件。A content Web page that hosts a control, the two custom controls, and a static connection to connect the two controls. - 如何运行示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到.ascx 文件，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性的`Register`指令对该用户控件，即托管主页面顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting master page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 代码示例的第二部分是为接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源代码文件包含一个简单的接口名为`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 此外，还有类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`的实现接口，并充当提供者控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 该方法只需返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意，该方法标记与`ConnectionProvider`其元数据中的属性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识提供者连接点的回调方法作为该方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 另类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并充当使用者的连接。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法标记为与使用者的连接点方法`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#4)] 代码示例的第三个部分是母版页。The third part of the code example is the master page. 应采取以下源代码，并将其保存在文件中，其命名为 MasterPageCS.master 或 MasterPageVB.master （使用具体取决于哪种语言）。You should take the following source code and save it in a file, naming it MasterPageCS.master or MasterPageVB.master (depending on which language you use). 请注意，主页面包含`Register`指令来注册该用户控件，和它引用用户控件本身的页的正文中。Note that the master page contains a `Register` directive to register the user control, and it references the user control itself in the body of the page. 母版页还声明一个``元素使用此页和所有相关内容页面。The master page also declares the single `` element used for this page and all related content pages. 最后，主页面具有``元素声明中插入内容页的位置页上的点。Finally, the master page has an `` element that declares the point in the page where the content page is inserted. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/MasterPageCS.master#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/MasterPageVB.master#1)] 代码示例的第四个部分是内容页。The fourth part of the code example is the content page. 应复制下面的源代码，并将其保存在.aspx 扩展名的文件。You should copy the following source code and save it in a file with an .aspx extension. 请注意，其`Page`指令包含`MasterFile`属性来引用母版页。Notice that its `Page` directive contains a `MasterFile` attribute to refer to the master page. 此外，此页包含`Register`指令包含动态编译的自定义的 App_Code 文件夹中注册该文件参与连接的控件。Also, this page has a `Register` directive to register the file in the App_Code folder that contains the dynamically compiled custom controls that participate in the connection. 内``标记的页上，没有 <`asp:proxywebpartmanager>`元素，具有一个子``又具有子元素``元素来声明连接的详细信息。Within the `` tags of the page, there is an <`asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element, with a child `` element, which in turn has a child `` element to declare the details of the connection. 内`

summary.span: 重写基属性，以阻止 控件包含其他控件。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent the control from containing controls.
Always returns an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法，以防止控件包含和返回的控件的集合。The method overrides the base method to prevent the control from containing and returning collections of controls. 其唯一用途是启用的应用程序使用主页面中的内容页中声明的静态连接。Its only purpose is to enable static connections to be declared in content pages within an application that uses master pages.

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止使用主题。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used.

value.span: 始终返回 ，以防止使用主题。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent themes from being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以防止主题与使用控件。The property overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used with the control. 这是为了防止它与用于任何主题传入冲突母版页中的控件 (其属性始终返回`true`)。This is to prevent it coming into conflict with any themes being used with the control in the master page (its property always returns `true`).

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以防止该方法被调用。

span.span: Overrides the base method to prevent the method from being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法，则会引发异常，如果任何调用方尝试调用的方法。The method overrides the base method and throws an exception if any caller attempts to call the method. 这是因为继承方法设计为与用户界面 (UI) 控件，但控件没有用户界面，因此具有无需设置焦点。This is because the inherited method is designed for controls with a user interface (UI), but the control has no UI and therefore has no need to set the focus.

exception.span: 调用方尝试调用此方法。

span.span: A caller tries to call this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基方法，并再执行任务来初始化控件。The method calls the base method, and then carries out tasks to initialize the control. 此方法的一项重要任务是将分配的所引用的连接集合属性设置为控件的集合。An important task of this method is to assign the collection of connections referenced by the property to the control's collection.

exception.span: 关联母版页的 控件为 。

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止对该基属性赋值。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
Always returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以防止对要传递给它，这样做会阻止的外观与正在使用控件。The property overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned to it, which has the effect of preventing skins from being used with the control. 这是因为该控件永远不会公开在页面上的用户界面 (UI)。This is done because the control never exposes a user interface (UI) on a page. 由实现相同的行为控制其属性。The same behavior is implemented by the control for its property.

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection StaticConnections { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property StaticConnections As ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection

summary.span: 获取内容页上在 元素中声明的静态连接的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of static connections declared within the element on a content page.

value.span: 一个 ，该集合中包含在 元素中声明的所有静态 对象。

span.span: A that contains all static objects declared within an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的集合中声明对象``元素。The property references the collection of objects declared in an `` element. 此集合中包含的连接添加到的静态连接控件 (所引用的其集合)，并完全视为与相关联的任何其他连接控件。The connections contained in this collection are added to the static connections of the controls (referenced by its collection), and treated exactly like any other connections associated with the control. 对应于的声明性元素属性是``元素。The declarative element that corresponds to the property is the `` element. 使用主页面，应用程序中``元素添加为的子``内容页上的元素和一个``元素又作为子级添加的``元素。In an application that uses master pages, the `` element is added as a child of the `` element on a content page, and an `` element in turn is added as a child of the `` element. 多个``可以将元素添加到一个``元素，并且多个内容页面可以作为主页面应用程序的一部分声明静态连接。Multiple `` elements can be added to one `` element, and multiple content pages can declare static connections as part of a master pages application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性上的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property on the class. 此代码示例演示只有声明的内容页中的代码的相关部分控制和静态连接。This code example shows only the relevant portion of the code from the content page that declares the control and the static connection. 有关运行代码示例中，并说明如何设置它们，所需的其他页面，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the other pages required to run the code example, and a description of how to set them up, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码是声明的内容页``的子元素``元素。The following code is the content page that declares the `` element as a child of the `` element. 另请注意，`Button1_Click`方法检查的计数属性上的控制并将其写入到页。Also note that the `Button1_Click` method checks the count of the property on the control and writes it to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/CS/contentPage1CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ProxyWebPartManager_Overview/VB/contentPage1VB.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击**WebPartManager 信息**按钮，然后观察有关的信息母版页中的控件和内容页中的控件。After you load the page in a browser, click the **WebPartManager Information** button and observe the information about the control in the master page, and the control in the content page. 例如，请注意它们两个跟踪静态连接其相应属性中具有相同的计数 (属性)。For example, note that they both have the same count in their respective properties that track static connections (the property).

summary.span: 重写基属性，以防止对该基属性赋值。

span.span: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.

value.span: 始终返回 ，以防止控件被设置为可见控件。

span.span: Always returns , to prevent the control from being made visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以防止被设置为可见的控件。The property overrides the base property to prevent the control from ever being made visible. 控件，如控制、 没有用户界面 (UI) 和永远不会向用户显示。The control, like the control, has no user interface (UI) and is never displayed to the user.

exception.span: 调用方尝试为此属性赋值。

span.span: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
